articles.description: The European Central Bank announced a new rate decision as inflation remains well-above its target.
articles.content:
Christine Lagarde, President of the European Central Bank (ECB), announced a new rate decision Thursday following new inflation data.
The European Central Bank on Thursday increased its benchmark in… [+3663 chars]
